attributes.action: Strip Prince Harry and Meghan of their Duke and Duchess of Sussex titles.
attributes.additional_details: Many people think the the have used the title inappropriately and for mere financial gain. They continually criticise the monarchy and make allegations that are at best not verifiable or are at worst completely untrue.
attributes.background: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex, Prince Harry and Meghan, have brought nothing but disrespect to the monarchy. They are no longer resident in the UK. As a resident of Sussex I would like to see them stripped of the right to use the title Duke and Duchess of Sussex.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions calling for people to lose an honour or appointment, including a title.
